attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The UK produces more than 434 million tonnes of waste every year of which 3 million tonnes is comprised of non-biodegradable plastic waste. One way to reduce this staggering figure is to reduce the amount of excess packaging carried out by supermarkets. Excess packaging comes in the form of individually packed vegetables and items being packed in two or more layers all of which is completely unnecessary.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
